claim: The Last House on the Left is a poem.
premise_source_doc_sentence: The American title refers to Wes Craven 's The Last House on the Left , and Alexandra Heller-Nicholas stated how `` combining the nunsploitation subgenre with rape-revenge , the film deviates plot-wise from The Last House on the Left substantially , but arrives at a similar ethical conclusion '' .

claim: The Last House on the Left is a poem.
premise_source_doc_sentence: Last Stop on the Night Train  (  L'ultimo treno della notte , released in the English-speaking countries as Night Train Murders , The New House on The Left , Second House on The Left , Do n't Ride on Late Night Trains , Late Night Trains , Last House Part II and Xmas Massacre  )  is a 1975 Italian revenge horror film directed Aldo Lado and starring Flavio Bucci , Macha Meril and Irene Miracle .

claim: The Last House on the Left is a poem.
premise_source_doc_sentence: In some cases , the character is incapacitated or killed at the end of the first act , and the `` revenge '' is carried out by their family , as in I Saw the Devil , the original The Last House on the Left and The House of the Spirits .

claim: The Last House on the Left is a poem.
premise_source_doc_sentence: The Last House on the Left was met with mixed reviews from critics .

claim: The Last House on the Left is a poem.
premise_source_doc_sentence: Based on the plots of Ingmar Bergman 's The Virgin Spring  (  1960  )  and Wes Craven 's The Last House on the Left  (  1972  )  , the film follows two girls riding a train through Germany on Christmas Eve , who are brutalized by three criminals who eventually end up lodging in their parents ' home .
